title: Game wouldn't let me ban Zed
body: Ban list bugged out - have had this problem about 9 or 10 patches ago, where a Champion doesn't appear in the list of Champions to ban.

replies.body: Oh really? Lol thanks, never knew this :p

*The unbannable Zed is the deadliest.*

A champion will not be available to ban if no one on the enemy team owns that champ. For all instances for when you couldn't ban a specific champion, did the enemy team ever choose that champion you couldn't ban?
